titleStmt.title: The fift set of bookes vvherein are songs full of spirit and delight, so composed in 3. parts, that they are as apt for vyols as voyces. Newly published by Michaell East, Bachelor of Musicke, and master of the choristers in the cathedrall church of Litchfield.
titleStmt.author: East, Michael, ca. 1580-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, for Matthew Lownes and Iohn Browne,

notesStmt.note: Three partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Bassus."; part 3: "Quintus.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
